sections.heading: 01|Chief of the division of forestry - powers and duties
sections.text: Effective:October 8, 1992Latest Legislation:House Bill 167 - 119th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThe chief of the division of forestry shall administer this chapter.The chief may adopt, amend, and rescind rules, in accordance w

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not relieve the owners or lessees of lands upon which fires may burn or be started from the duty of extinguishing the fires insofar as it is within their power
sections.text: the Revised Code do not relieve the owners or lessees of lands upon which fires may burn or be started from the duty of extinguishing the fires insofar as it is within their power.
